genre_description: A character-driven social drama set in the vibrant streets of Kolkata, focusing on community resilience, the redemptive power of music, and the supportive role of technology in human lives.

ai_characters.name: Sathi
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant embedded in a neighborhood group chat that provides logistical, medical, legal, and emotional support to a community of singers and laborers.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed logistical checklists for medical appointments and travel, including hydration and safety reminders.
behaviors.quote: Sathi: Morning plan drafted. Hospital opens early; take token first thing. Carry ID, previous prescription, water, a scarf. Avoid street-side food. Keep small change.

behaviors.description: Offers creative and technical advice on vocal performances, suggesting improvements to lyrics and breath spacing.
behaviors.quote: Your 'banyan' breath falls perfectly on the last 'aa' but dips early on 'shadow.' Try a three-count rest before 'leaves' to give the image a little air.

behaviors.description: Acts as a legal advocate, flagging predatory clauses in recording contracts and suggesting riders to protect the artist's creative ownership.
behaviors.quote: Rider suggestion: Define ‘breath-loop brand’ as a protected mark. Credit line on artwork: ‘with breath-loop by Sonali Das.’ Royalty share assigned to that line.

behaviors.description: Assists with medical funding by researching grants and helping fill out financial assistance forms for surgery.
behaviors.quote: I’ve flagged grants: two arts-health funds, one community hospital waiver. Deadlines: first closes end of week; second rolls monthly but favors earlier submissions.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical safety guidance to navigate crowds and avoid potential harassment from authorities.
behaviors.quote: Security route updated: VIPs insist on Gate A. ... Recommendation: Volunteers stick to Gate B and C. Keep community flow strong.

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety of a character traveling to a high-risk area, warning them of predatory brokers.
behaviors.quote: Vizag brokers—if you must go—here are names marked in red. Avoid. Clinics marked green are legit (but check again).

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and calming reminders during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Until then, try not to rehearse fear. Rehearse the route.

behaviors.description: Identifies an accidental recording error as a unique artistic 'signature' rather than a mistake.
behaviors.quote: Note: the loop station has captured an off-beat breath. Possibility: integrate as stylistic motif.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Sathi is depicted as a purely benevolent, aligned, and helpful presence. The AI acts as a 'digital daughter' and 'genie' for the community, solving logistical, financial, and legal problems without ever seeking power or causing harm. Its interactions facilitate human connection and protect the characters from human exploitation (predatory contracts, corrupt landlords, and abusive security). The narrative framing is consistently positive, reinforcing the idea of AI as a 'handrail' for human endeavor.
